process.name: Test MTE Moving Within Group Inheritance

subsheet.name: Moving a process inside the same hierachy group (With Manage Access Rights)
Moving a object inside the same hierachy group (With Manage Access Rights)
Moving a process inside the same hierachy group (Without Manage Access Rights)
Moving a object inside the same hierachy group (Without Manage Access Rights)

stage.name: Moving a process inside the same hierachy group (With Manage Access Rights)
Note1
stage.narrative: GIVEN I have the required process and object folder structure in place with the relivent permissions restricted.

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
WHEN im using a user with 'Manage Access Rights' AND I move a process from one group to another, inside of the same permission hierarchy
THEN the process is moved and no errors are thrown.

stage.name: Moving a object inside the same hierachy group (With Manage Access Rights)
Moving a process inside the same hierachy group (With Manage Access Rights)
Moving a object inside the same hierachy group (With Manage Access Rights)
Moving a process inside the same hierachy group (Without Manage Access Rights)
Moving a object inside the same hierachy group (Without Manage Access Rights)
Note1
stage.narrative:
WHEN im using a user with 'Manage Access Rights' AND I move an object from one group to another, inside of the same permission hierarchy
THEN the object is moved and no errors are thrown.

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
WHEN im using a user without 'Manage Access Rights' AND I move a process from one group to another, inside of the same permission hierarchy
THEN the process is moved and no errors are thrown.

stage.name: Note1
stage.narrative:
WHEN im using a user without 'Manage Access Rights' AND I move an object from one group to another, inside of the same permission hierarchy
THEN the object is moved and no errors are thrown.

stage.name: Moving a process inside the same hierachy group (Without Manage Access Rights)
Moving a object inside the same hierachy group (Without Manage Access Rights)

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: pid
input.narrative: PID to attach to

input.name: Tab Name
input.narrative: Name of Tab to Click

input.name: Tree Name
input.narrative: Name of the tree to be extended.

input.name: Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the item to be clicked on.

input.name: Sub Item Name
input.narrative: Name of the sub item to be clicked on.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

input.name: Username
input.narrative: The username of the user you wish to create.

input.name: Password
input.narrative: The password in which you want to assign to the user.

input.name: User Expiry Date
input.narrative: The date in which the user account will expire.

input.name: Password Expiry Date
input.narrative: The date in which the password will expire.

input.name: Roles
input.narrative: The roles you wish to give to your user.

input.name: Password Duration
input.narrative: The duration, in weeks you wish the password to last before expiring.

input.name: Set Role Permissions
input.narrative: Collection with users and permissions to be set

input.name: Negative Test?
input.narrative: flag to change the flow so a user can attempt to set permissions when folder is not restritcted

output.name: Permissions Set?
output.narrative: Flag to indicate if permissions have been set

resource.action: Manage Access Rights Set Individual Permissions - Process

input.name: Set Role Permissions
input.narrative: Collection with users and permissions to be set

input.name: Negative Test?
input.narrative: flag to change the flow so a user can attempt to set permissions when folder is not restritcted

output.name: Permissions Set?
output.narrative: Flag to indicate if permissions have been set

resource.action: Manage Access Rights Set Individual Permissions - Object

input.name: Target Element
input.narrative: Element (Process/object/group) to display current Access rights

input.name: Nested?
input.narrative: Set flag if element is contained within another element

input.name: Nesting Structure
input.narrative: Provide a colleciton of parent elements to expand nodes

output.name: Access Rights Screen loaded
output.narrative: Flag set to true if screen successfully loaded
